title: Satisfaction Survey for Code.org's CS Fundamentals Intro Professional Development Workshop

elements.name: intro_text
elements.html:
Well done, you've completed the Code.org CS Fundamentals Intro workshop!

This survey asks questions about your experience today. Your feedback is crucial to ensuring we best serve educators through continual program improvement.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share de-identified, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your de-identified responses will be used by Code.org, our Regional Partners, and our facilitators for program improvement.

elements.name: curriculum_impressions
elements.title: Having attended the workshop, what are your overall impressions of the {workshop_course} curriculum?

rows.text: I am going to love teaching with this curriculum.
I understand what CS Fundamentals courses look like, including lesson plans, online activities, and unplugged activities.
I understand which courses and lessons are most appropriate for my students.
I understand all of the tools and technologies I can use in the curriculum.
I am aware of strategies to support an inclusive CS classroom.
I am aware of strategies to overcome barriers to implementing this curriculum.

elements.name: feedback_venue_logistics
elements.title: Do you have feedback about the venue and the way logistics were run for this workshop? Please be specific and provide suggestions for improvement.

elements.name: anything_else
elements.title: Is there anything else youâ€™d like to tell us about your experience at this workshop?

elements.name: last_text
elements.html: Lastly, we would like to know a little about you, your background, and if we can stay in touch with you.
